backpack: Specializing the top research agent on critique tasks (and optionally on a specific research field) by further training it on relevant data.. Context from paper: The critic is the lab’s top research agent (for which we have a no-scheming safety case), specialized (through finetuning) on the task of critique, and maybe also specialized on the research field of the paper being critiqued (although this is more expensive) The main way these signals are used is by finetuning the critic

Modeling the critic’s confidence as a probability distribution over the severity of flaws, allowing uncertainty quantification even with limited compute.. Context from paper: A more natively Bayesian approach might additionally have the critic stating the probability that a piece of work is severely flawed (even when it doesn’t have the compute to fully find or assess these flaws)

concept: prompt different instances of this agent with different contexts
backpack:
Running multiple parallel prompts that each receive varied subsets of logs or instructions to generate diverse candidate flaws (a multi‑prompt ensemble).. Context from paper: It’s run in a scaffold that babbles and prunes possible flaws:
	•	First, we prompt different instances of this agent with different contexts: different subsets of the whole research logs or paper, different instructions to focus on this or that failure mode, etc
anchor_exact: prompt different instances of this agent with different contexts
anchor_alias: prompt different instances of this agent with different contexts

concept: probability that a piece of work is severely flawed
backpack: A scalar confidence score output by the critic, representing the estimated likelihood of critical methodological issues.. Context from paper: A more natively Bayesian approach might additionally have the critic stating the probability that a piece of work is severely flawed (even when it doesn’t have the compute to fully find or assess these flaws)
anchor_exact: probability that a piece of work is severely flawed
anchor_alias: probability that a piece of work is severely flawed

backpack: The critic dynamically selects which hypothesized flaws to investigate further by applying logical deduction from fundamental concepts.. Context from paper: This involves not only first principles reasoning, but also consulting a database of past similar mistakes, baselines about research to facilitate forecasting, etc

A knowledge base consulted during flaw investigation to retrieve analogous errors and baseline expectations for forecasting.. Context from paper: This involves not only first principles reasoning, but also consulting a database of past similar mistakes, baselines about research to facilitate forecasting, etc
